verses.roman:
eta śuni' yavanera mana phiri' gela
āpana-'viśvāsa' uḍiyā sthāne pāṭhāila

synonyms: eta śuni'-after hearing this; yavanera—of the Mohammedan governor; mana—the mind; phiri' gela—became changed; āpana—own; viśvāsa—secretary; uḍiyā—of the representative of the Orissan government; sthāne—to the place; pāṭhāila—sent.
translation: Upon hearing this, the mind of the Mohammedan governor was changed. He then sent his own secretary to the representative of the Orissan government.
